questions.question_text:
Channel sales representatives at Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) need to push pre-qualified leads to their partners. Partners need the ability to access and update the leads assigned to them. To meet this requirement, NTO plans to implement lead management functionality.
Which solution should a consultant recommend?

choices.B: Create a task for a partner when a new lead is created and assign the task to the partner in the Partner Community.
choices.A: Create a customized site where partners can self-register and access their leads.
choices.D: Add the leads tab to the Partner Community and configure partner profiles to access leads.
choices.C: Configure a separate lead record type and page layout for the Partner Community.

questions.question_text:
The Universal Containers sales team wants to easily show Account relationships to its sales reps and report on these relationships.

Which two considerations should the consultant take into account? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Account relationships are visible from Person Account records.
choices.A: Account Hierarchy displays only the Accounts users have Read permission to view.
choices.D: A Person Account can be either a parent or child in the Account Hierarchy.
choices.B: Accounts can be organized into different divisions based on specific criteria.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
AB is it

C & D are not correct: Person accounts can’t be included in account hierarchies. https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.salesteam_def.htm&type=5
A & B are correct

choices.A: Limit the number of activity boxes on the screen to 8 to 10.
choices.B: Use symbols of different colors, arrows, and swim lanes for clarity.
choices.D: Attach supporting information at the detail level.
choices.C: Keep version control and change history at the diagram level.

questions.question_text:
Northern Trails Outfitters (NTO) is ready to start the next phase of its Salesforce implementation. A consultant recommends using Universal Process Notation (UPN) to document the business process maps NTO will use as its guide.

As NIO maps out its processes, which two key principals of UPN should the team keep in mind? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A & C
Keep these principles in mind as you map a business process using UPN. 

Aim for no more than 8–10 activity boxes on a screen.
You can drill down from an activity box to the next level of detail.
You can attach supporting information to an activity box.
Access rights determine who can view and edit the diagram.
You can see change history at the diagram level

Selected Answer: AD
AD is it

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers (UC) has acquired another company that uses Salesforce and is migrating its legacy data, email alerts, and approval processes.

Which two steps should the consultant perform to maintain data integrity? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Enable the Create Audit Fields permission to insert historically accurate records.
choices.C: Merge the legacy Salesforce org into UC's Salesforce org and migrate the approval processes.
choices.A: Insert users, and then migrate email alerts and approval processes into UC's Salesforce.org.
choices.B: Use the Salesforce Approval Process done feature to migrate approval processes.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
AD is it

choices.A: Send a survey to all employees asking for a list of desired charges.
choices.B: Ask all employees to email their ideas and feedback to the consultant.
choices.D: Arrange multiple sessions with small groups of employees.
choices.C: Ask management to select which employees should participate in sessions.
choices.E: Meet with a large group of employees to listen to then feedback.

questions.question_text:
The sales manager at Cloud Kicks has proposed that the consultant hold one large discovery meeting with 250 employees who use Salesforce currently to gain information to improve adoption.

What are the three efficient approaches the consultant could recommend to the sales manager? (Choose three.)
